title: TV review: PBS’s ‘Home Fires’ brings warmth
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Entertainment - Today 
A feel-good soap that brings to mind past “Masterpiece” classic “Cranford,” the new “Home Fires” (8 p.m. Sunday, WQED-TV) offers...
